Description.Name: Airburst Mortar Ammo
Description.Details:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit.

Airburst mortar shells separate into bomblets in mid-air to inflict damage on a single target. Airburst Mortar Ammo Bins each contain 24 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.
